name: project-chimera
description: Multi-agent orchestration system using MCP-inspired architecture

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd orchestrator && npm install && cd ../agents/sanitizer && npm install && cd ../log-analyzer && npm install && cd ../report-generator && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.build:all: cd orchestrator && npm run build && cd ../agents/sanitizer && npm run build && cd ../log-analyzer && npm run build && cd ../report-generator && npm run build && cd ../..
